title: Living to Suffer - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Historical   Mature   Romance   Smut   Tragedy   Wuxia   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Ancient China   Calm Protagonist   Carefree Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cultivation   Death of Loved Ones   Doctors   Enemies Become Lovers   Hiding True Identity   Living Alone   Loneliness   M*sturbation   Medical Knowledge   Orphans   Protagonist Falls in Love First   R*pe   Sickly Characters   Strong Love Interests   Unrequited Love
author: Tangstory   鱼香肉丝
description:
And his life had been but a prelude to these three things – a summer shower, a glimpse of inky reeds and one man.

Shen Liangsheng is lying in the dirt bleeding away when a doctor, Ch'in Ching, discovers the wounded man. This sets off a series of events, some the doctor expected and others that catches him off guard but are nonetheless all a part of destiny's plans to pit these two men's desires against their principles.>
